availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Frank G. Clark (Pulaski County, Ky, carpenter, lieut. 1st. Ky. L. A. )

body.p: Pulaski County, Kentucky, carpenter and soldier. New Jersey native. Carpenter in 1863. Served in the 1st Kentucky Light Artillery Regiment (U.S.A.) as private, sergeant, and lieutenant from February 24, 1863, to August 1, 1865.

ab.bibl: Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 0148.
